attributes.action: Keep the wearing of face masks mandatory after July 19th on public transport
attributes.additional_details: Much medical advice is against the easing of the requirement to wear masks. Boris Johnson and the Government will be personally responsible if we have to endure yet another lockdown. Be brave like Nicola Sturgeon has been.
attributes.background: I's a cop-out to place the decision on the wearing of face-masks with the individual. For every responsible citizen, there's likely to be one who isn't. Keep us safe by keeping masks compulsory.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Keep face masks mandatory for public transport after the lifting of restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590694
